text: And then she received a jolt. Old Hubert, standing beside her, his battered hat in his hand, his toothless mouth stretched in a wide grin, told her in halting patois that 'Mistah Piershad explained right at the start that Mis'Beryl would be plenty, plenty sad not to be back at the Villa in time.
handwritten_text: And then she received a jolt. Old Hubert, standing beside her, his battered hat in his hand, his toothless mouth stretched in a wide grin, told her in halting patois that 'Mistah Piershad explained right at the start that Mis'Beryl would be plenty, plenty sad not to be back at the Villa in time.
